title: Is gravitational time dilation true? - Quora

response.answer_text: yes,it is  true .it is described in bagavatham that a once a man went to other galaxy from earth and he stays there for 20 min ,relatively on earth it is equals to 116,640,000 years .I saw this in you tube "vedic theories of universe(ancient indian scriptures)"
It happens every moment. The satellite, which revolves around Earth in the orbits, experiences slower time than us on the surface of Earth. So it needs to synchronize time with Earth every moment.
